snippet: UBS has agreed to pay $120 million to settle a lawsuit by investors who accused the Swiss bank of misleading them about the financial condition of Lehman Brothers in connection with the sale of structured notes.
abstract: UBS agrees to pay $120 million to settle lawsuit by investors who accused bank of misleading them about financial condition of Lehman Brothers in connection with sale of structured notes.
lead_paragraph: UBS has agreed to pay $120 million to settle a lawsuit by investors who accused the Swiss bank of misleading them about the financial condition of Lehman Brothers in connection with the sale of structured notes.

headline.main: UBS Settles Suit in Lehman Brothers Bankruptcy
headline.print_headline: UBS Settles Suit in Lehman Brothers Bankruptcy
